Mike Pence said he embraced the Republican Party while attending law school in Indianapolis, largely because he heard in Ronald Reagan the manifestation of the kind of traditional American ideals that I was raised to believe in. ( Besides Reagan, Mike Pence 's other top political heroes include Republicans Jack Kemp and Dan Quayle .) But his first attempts at elected office didn't go smoothly.
